price: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day, and will grant them radiance and delight,
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
